docs.lead_paragraph: IF I ask my 16-year-old twin sons to do something with me, like go to a movie or take a bike ride, they think it's hilarious. ''Yeah, right, Dad,'' says Sam.
docs.abstract: Michael Winerip Parenting column describes trip to Bronx Zoo and how adolescent male gorillas remind him of his twin 16-year-old sons; photo (M)
docs.snippet: IF I ask my 16-year-old twin sons to do something with me, like go to a movie or take a bike ride, they think it's hilarious.     ''Yeah, right, Dad,'' says Sam.
